structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXIX. NW 79TH STREET CORRIDOR COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AGENCY

text.section:
Sec. 2-2100. Annual report.
The Agency shall file with the Board and with the Auditor General, on or before March 31 of each year, a report of its activities for the preceding fiscal year and outlining its contemplated activities for the ensuing year, which report shall include a complete financial statement setting forth its assets, liabilities, income, and operating expenses as of the end of such fiscal year. At the time of filing the report, the Agency shall publish in a newspaper of general circulation in the County a notice to the effect that such report has been filed with the County and that the report is available for inspection during business hours in the office of the Clerk of the Board and in the office of the Agency.
